text: Eghtɨ gumazitam arazir kuratam ia damightɨ, ia arazir kuramɨn a ikarvaghan markɨ. Me akar kuratamɨn ia mɨkemeghtɨ, ia akar kuramɨn me ikarvaghan markɨ. Ia me ikarvaghamin arazimra kara, ia me bagh God ko mɨkɨmtɨma, an arazir aghuim me damu. God bizir aghuim ia danɨngasa, kamaghɨn a ian dia. Ezɨ kamaghɨn ia gumazir igharaziba arazir aghuim me damu.
